name: Zojja's Journal: Skyward Marches
requirement: Collect all of Zojja's journal pages in the Skyward Marches fractal.
locked_text: Unlock by starting the Zojja's Journal collection.

bits.text: Restore purpose to the Zaishen of Skyward Marches.
Page Location: Skyward Marches, at the ward's western camp.
Page Location: Skyward Marches, where a cliff overlooks good and evil.
Page Location: Skyward Marches, atop a village building caressed by the wind.
